issue.title: [Packaging][Python] Build manylinux2014 wheels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7344](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7344). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0599/

https://github.com/pypa/manylinux/issues/338 tracks the standard's progress

https://quay.io/organization/pypa now has manylinux2014 wheels on it

I've been experimenting with it and have made https://dl.bintray.com/nealrichardson/pyarrow-dev/pyarrow-0.15.1.dev427+ga309da790.d20191206-cp37-cp37m-linux_x86_64.whl

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7344?focusedCommentId=16992137) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6002
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6002>
